text: High Rhulain is a fantasy book written by Brian Jacques in 2005. It is the eighteenth book in the Redwall series, and was also translated into French and Russian. ==Plot== A young female otter named Tiria Wildlough is living at Redwall Abbey. When she gets a vision and riddle from the long-dead hero Martin the Warrior, she sets out with a hare named Cuthbert Blanedale Frunk in search of an island called Green Isle to fight an evil wildcat and lead a bunch of otters to freedom. ==References== Category:Redwall Category:2005 books
title: High Rhulain
